ValidationRule.description: Ensures Rate Card is not Blank if Rate Type = Rate Card
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(amc__Rate_Type__c, "Rate Card"), OR( ISBLANK(amc__Rate_Card_Entry__c), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Role__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Project__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Skill__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Rate Card Entry must contain a value, Role, Project, and Skill must be empty.
